title: AI Workflow Dashboard
description: An intelligent orchestration platform that combines OpenAI, n8n, and Supabase to automate end-to-end business processes. Designed for engineers who need modular pipelines for content generation, analytics syncing, and report automation.
highlights: Built reusable workflow templates using n8n for content and data automation.
Integrated OpenAI’s GPT endpoints for decision-making and content processing.
Used Supabase as a real-time backend for logs, users, and workflow states.

title: Dev Portfolio Generator
description: A developer-friendly CLI that scaffolds modern, fast, and themeable portfolios using Vite, Tailwind CSS, and shadcn UI. It helps engineers create professional portfolio sites in seconds with JSON-driven customization.
highlights: Generates complete React + Vite projects with dynamic JSON config files.
Supports light/dark theme presets and shadcn component variants.
Automates deployment to Vercel with built-in configuration support.

title: Vision API Playground
description: An experimental web app for testing and comparing vision-based AI models, including OpenAI’s image analysis APIs and custom FastAPI backends. Users can upload, tag, and analyze images directly from the browser.
highlights: Implemented image-to-text and visual tagging via OpenAI Vision API.
Deployed a Python FastAPI microservice for preprocessing and logging results.
Created a responsive UI for visualizing inference outputs and performance metrics.

title: Realtime Chat with Supabase & OpenAI
description: A real-time AI chat app integrating Supabase Realtime with GPT message context persistence. Users can chat, edit, and resume sessions seamlessly with live token streaming.
highlights: Implemented live token-based streaming from OpenAI completions endpoint.
Integrated Supabase Auth + Database for persistent chat history.
Optimized serverless deployment for minimal cold start and latency.
